title: Love Live! Sunshine!! Aqours World LoveLive! Blu-ray Memorial BOX
description:
Love Live! Sunshine!! Aqours World LoveLive! Blu-ray Memorial BOX (ラブライブ! サンシャイン!! Aqours World LoveLive! Blu-ray Memorial BOX) is a Blu-ray release of Aqours' two overseas live concert events that took place in the following locations:
*KBS Hall in Seoul, South Korea on April 21, 2019
*The Novo in Los Angeles, CA, United States on July 5, 2019

infobox.Image: Aqours World LoveLive! Blu-ray Memorial BOX.jpg
infobox.Name: '''Love Live! Sunshine!! Aqours World LoveLive! Blu-ray Memorial BOX'''
infobox.Label: Lantis
infobox.Previous: Love Live! Sunshine!! Unit Live Adventure 2020
